name: Abs 'n Ads
description:
Get into shape before summer! But don't get distracted by all shortcuts, tricks and enhancers offered. There's only one way to become your ideal self and that is to:

PUMP 'EM MUSCLES!

The game is best not played in fullscreen mode and requires some memory to run... especially to play more than once (try reloading if you have problems with that).

For each set:

  • Select what part(s) of you want to exercise
  • If it is the first time on that body part, select what your ideal shape is for it.

When summer rolls in, snap a picture of your beautiful self on the beach.
